description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝异母弟。清朝有史以来第九位铁帽子王，也是第一位因功受封的铁帽子王。雍正帝即位后，改名允祥，逝世后获准改回原名。谥号“贤”。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor. He was the 9th iron-cap prince in Qing history and the first to be granted the title for merit. He changed his name to Yunxiang after the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, and was allowed to revert to his original name posthumously. His posthumous name was 'Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清圣祖，在位61年，是中国历史上在位时间最长的皇帝。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, posthumously known as Emperor Shengzu. His 61-year reign makes him the longest-reigning emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝妃嫔，皇十三子胤祥、皇十三女和硕温恪公主、皇十五女和硕敦恪公主的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Kangxi Emperor, and the birth mother of the 13th prince Yinxiang, the 13th princess Heshuo Wenke, and the 15th princess Heshuo Dunke.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，清世宗，康熙帝第四子。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, posthumously known as Emperor Shizong, and the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第七子，第二代怡亲王。
description.en: The seventh son of Yinxiang and the second Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥嫡福晋，吏部尚书玛尔汉之女。
description.en: The primary consort of Yinxiang, daughter of Marhan, the Minister of Personnel.

description.zh-cn: 正白旗满洲，官至吏部尚书，胤祥岳父。
description.en: A Manchu of the Plain White Banner who served as the Minister of Personnel. He was Yinxiang's father-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第四女，母嫡福晋兆佳氏。雍正初年被抚养于宫中，后下嫁喀尔喀博尔济锦氏多尔济塞布腾。
description.en: The fourth daughter of Yinxiang with his primary consort Lady Zhaojia. She was raised in the palace during the early Yongzheng era and later married Dorjisebten of the Khalkha Borjigin clan.

description.zh-cn: 喀尔喀博尔济锦氏，和硕和惠公主的丈夫。
description.en: Of the Khalkha Borjigin clan, husband of Princess Heshuo Hehui.

description.zh-cn: 和硕和惠公主与多尔济塞布腾之子，胤祥外孙。
description.en: Son of Princess Heshuo Hehui and Dorjisebten, grandson of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

en: Prince Yi of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭亲王爵位，始封者为康熙帝第十三子胤祥。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty. Its first holder was Yinxiang, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝特有的世袭罔替的王爵。胤祥是清朝第九位铁帽子王，也是首位因功绩获此恩封的亲王。
description.en: A special hereditary princely rank in the Qing dynasty that could be passed down without demotion. Yinxiang was the 9th iron-cap prince and the first to receive this honor for his merits.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十三女，胤祥同胞妹。
description.en: The 13th daughter of the Kangxi Emperor and a full sister of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十五女，胤祥同胞妹。
description.en: The 15th daughter of the Kangxi Emperor and a full sister of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥长子，母为侧福晋瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: The first son of Yinxiang, his mother was Secondary Consort Lady Guwalgiya.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第三子，母为嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: The third son of Yinxiang, his mother was Primary Consort Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第四子，封宁良郡王，母为嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: The fourth son of Yinxiang, granted the title Prince Ning of the Second Rank, his mother was Primary Consort Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥侧福晋之一。
description.en: One of Yinxiang's secondary consorts.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥侧福晋之一。
description.en: One of Yinxiang's secondary consorts.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥庶福晋之一。
description.en: One of Yinxiang's concubines.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第九子，母为庶福晋纳喇氏。
description.en: The ninth son of Yinxiang, his mother was Concubine Lady Nara.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥第六子，母为侧福晋乌苏氏。
description.en: The sixth son of Yinxiang, his mother was Secondary Consort Lady Wusu.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是清圣祖康熙帝的第十三子。
description.en: Yinxiang was the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor of Qing.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥的生母是敬敏皇贵妃章佳氏。
description.en: Yinxiang's birth mother was Imperial Noble Consort Jingmin of the Janggiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥（皇十三子）与雍正帝（皇四子胤禛）是康熙帝的儿子，为异母兄弟。
description.en: Yinxiang (the 13th prince) and the Yongzheng Emperor (the 4th prince Yinzhen) were sons of the Kangxi Emperor, making them half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，极大地提拔和重用胤祥，任命其为总理事务大臣，封为和硕怡亲王，并担任首席军机大臣等要职，赐予世袭罔替的铁帽子王爵位，是雍正朝的核心支柱。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor greatly promoted and relied on Yinxiang, appointing him Grand Minister of State Affairs, creating him Prince Yi of the First Rank, and having him serve as the first Chief Grand Council Minister. He was granted the hereditary 'iron-cap' princely rank and was a core pillar of the Yongzheng administration.

description.zh-cn: 康熙四十七年（1708年）废太子事件后，康熙帝在上谕中提及“十三阿哥，朕另有处置”，将其与罪臣之子并列，显示了康熙晚年对胤祥的打压。
description.en: After the incident of deposing the crown prince in 1708 (the 47th year of the Kangxi reign), the Kangxi Emperor mentioned in an edict, 'As for the 13th Prince, I have other arrangements,' listing him alongside sons of convicted officials, indicating his suppression of Yinxiang in his later years.

position.zh-cn: 皇子、和硕怡亲王、总理事务大臣、首席军机大臣
position.en: Imperial Prince, Prince Yi of the First Rank, Grand Minister of State Affairs, Chief Grand Council Minister

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是清朝皇子，在雍正朝担任核心大臣。
description.en: Yinxiang was a Qing dynasty imperial prince and served as a core minister during the Yongzheng era.

description.zh-cn: 康熙六十一年（1722年），雍正帝即位后封胤祥为和硕怡亲王，为第一代怡亲王。
description.en: In 1722 (the 61st year of the Kangxi reign), after ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor created Yinxiang as Prince Yi of the First Rank, making him the first Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥去世后，其第七子弘晓承袭怡亲王爵位。
description.en: After Yinxiang's death, his seventh son Hongxiao inherited the title of Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥因对雍正朝的巨大贡献，获雍正帝赐予其爵位世袭罔替的恩典，成为清朝第九位铁帽子王。
description.en: Due to his immense contributions to the Yongzheng court, Yinxiang was granted the privilege of a perpetually hereditary peerage by the Yongzheng Emperor, becoming the ninth 'iron-cap' prince of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 兆佳氏是胤祥的嫡福晋（正妻）。
description.en: Lady Zhaojia was Yinxiang's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 兆佳氏是吏部尚书玛尔汉的女儿。
description.en: Lady Zhaojia was the daughter of Marhan, the Minister of Personnel.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓是胤祥的第七子。
description.en: Hongxiao was the seventh son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓的生母是胤祥嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: Hongxiao's birth mother was Yinxiang's primary consort, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 和硕和惠公主是胤祥的第四女。
description.en: Princess Heshuo Hehui was the fourth daughter of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 和硕和惠公主的生母是胤祥嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: Princess Heshuo Hehui's birth mother was Yinxiang's primary consort, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 雍正七年十二月，和硕和惠公主下嫁喀尔喀博尔济锦氏多尔济塞布腾。
description.en: In the twelfth month of the seventh year of the Yongzheng reign (1729), Princess Heshuo Hehui married Dorjisebten of the Khalkha Borjigin clan.

description.zh-cn: 桑斋多尔济是和硕和惠公主的儿子。
description.en: Sangjaidorji was the son of Princess Heshuo Hehui.

description.zh-cn: 和惠公主去世后，其子桑斋多尔济由外祖母兆佳氏在北京抚养。
description.en: After Princess Hehui's death, her son Sangjaidorji was raised in Beijing by his maternal grandmother, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥与和硕温恪公主是同胞兄妹，生母均为敬敏皇贵妃章佳氏。
description.en: Yinxiang and Princess Heshuo Wenke were full siblings, both born to Imperial Noble Consort Jingmin of the Janggiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥与和硕敦恪公主是同胞兄妹，生母均为敬敏皇贵妃章佳氏。
description.en: Yinxiang and Princess Heshuo Dunke were full siblings, both born to Imperial Noble Consort Jingmin of the Janggiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 弘昌是胤祥的长子。
description.en: Hongchang was the first son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘昌的生母是胤祥侧福晋瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: Hongchang's birth mother was Yinxiang's secondary consort, Lady Guwalgiya.

description.zh-cn: 弘暾是胤祥的第三子。
description.en: Hongtun was the third son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘暾的生母是胤祥嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: Hongtun's birth mother was Yinxiang's primary consort, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 弘晈是胤祥的第四子。
description.en: Hongjiao was the fourth son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘晈的生母是胤祥嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: Hongjiao's birth mother was Yinxiang's primary consort, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 弘昑是胤祥的第六子。
description.en: Hongqin was the sixth son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘昑的生母是胤祥侧福晋乌苏氏。
description.en: Hongqin's birth mother was Yinxiang's secondary consort, Lady Wusu.

description.zh-cn: 阿穆瑚琅是胤祥的第九子。
description.en: Amuhulang was the ninth son of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 阿穆瑚琅的生母是胤祥庶福晋纳喇氏。
description.en: Amuhulang's birth mother was Yinxiang's concubine, Lady Nara.
